dialog.text: Hi, what can I do for you... Oh my god, you're Magnus! I recgonize you!

options.text: Why, hello there! Do I know you?
Always nice to meet a fan!
Let's keep this between us. Call me Phil.

dialog.text: I saw your show in the Underdark! What was it, 2 years ago?

options.text: No, the last time I was there was at least 5 years ago.

dialog.text: Why do we need to keep it a secret?

options.text: I am undercover, trying to save this town from the Temporal Chalice.
No particular reason. Who are you?
If I told you that, I would have to kill you.

dialog.text: No, I'm sure it was only two years ago. What are you doing here?

options.text: I am undercover, trying to save this town from the Temporal Chalice.
No particular reason.
If I told you that, I would have to kill you.

dialog.text: Temporal Chalice? I've never heard of it.

options.text: Where did the thing around town come from?
I'm going to talk to some other people, try to find out some more.

dialog.text: Sounds a little weird, but I'll go along with it.

options.text: Where did the thing around town come from?
Have you heard of the Temporal Chalice?

dialog.text: Oh, the Bubble? It keeps us safe from the outside.

options.text: Safe from what?
What made it?

dialog.text: From the dangers of outside. The bad people out there.

options.text: Who made it?
I'm going to talk to some other people, try to find out some more.

dialog.text: The visitors made it, and saved our town from the outside.

options.text: Safe from what?
I'm going to talk to some other people, try to find out some more.

dialog.text: Well let me know if you need anything.

options.text: (Walk away)
